titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

action.text: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Vitter. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

bill.summary: 1/28/2015--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship for the 114th Congress.
